description:
You might have caught Leo on another site, but he's decided to come work for me for a while.
Leo is a hard guy to figure out. His girlfriend thinks he's gay. His friends think he is gay, and he sounds a little on the gay side. But the guy really is into the straight porn. So I don't know if he just hasn't figured it out yet and is putting himself in the line of fire to ease himself in to it.
He's done solo work and I think he received a blow job. So I am gonna step him up and see if we can push his boundaries.
Leo does like to show off his ass, and does love to have fingers in it, and I think he has fantasies of getting fucked.
So for his solo I tossed a butt plug in there. He struggled to get it all the way in (It's deliciously tedious waiting for him to get in that last 'lil bit!"
Once he was on his back, he got it in all the way, and it made him bust in no time at all. A future Bottom in the making?!
Leo is a super sweet guy, and I am stoked to him on my team. What a body!
title: Leo - Toys
